TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academy[COLOR_REVERT] increases a city's scientific research as well as providing a small amount of culture.
Administrative Center

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Airports[COLOR_REVERT] add an additional trade route, provide an experience bonus to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Air Units[COLOR_REVERT], house four extra Air Units for a total of eight and can airlift one unit per turn to any of your other cities. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Airports[COLOR_REVERT] also add unhealthiness.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mall[COLOR_REVERT], the American replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarket[COLOR_REVERT], greatly increases the wealth output of the city when it has access to power and increases the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Football Events[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Singles[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Movies[COLOR_REVERT].
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Administrative Center[COLOR_REVERT] reduces the maintenance costs in nearby cities. It increases the chances of creating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT].
Alchemist
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Alchemist[COLOR_REVERT], the Arabian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pharmacy[COLOR_REVERT], increases the city's science output.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueducts[COLOR_REVERT] store food to help increase a city's growth rate.
Cold Storage Plant

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cold Storage Plant[COLOR_REVERT], the Argentine replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarket[COLOR_REVERT], increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cows[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pigs[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sacrificial Altar[COLOR_REVERT], the Aztec replacements for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jail[COLOR_REVERT], reduces the anger duration from sacrificing population and is cheaper.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Banks[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increase a city's production of wealth. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Banks[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Central Bank[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Terrace[COLOR_REVERT], the Incan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Granary[COLOR_REVERT], provides culture.
Totem Pole
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Totem Pole[COLOR_REVERT], the Native American replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], grants archery units three bonus experience.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Barracks[COLOR_REVERT] grant experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Land Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in its city.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bomb Shelters[COLOR_REVERT] reduce damage from nuclear attacks.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Broadcast Towers[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increase a city's cultural output with access to power. They also increase the happiness output from using the culture slider, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Football Events[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Singles[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hit Movies[COLOR_REVERT].
Fazenda

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fazenda[COLOR_REVERT], the Brazilian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Estate[COLOR_REVERT], increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bananas[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tobacco[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bunkers[COLOR_REVERT] reduce damage from air attacks.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Royal Mounted Police[COLOR_REVERT], the Canadian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Constabulary[COLOR_REVERT], provides extra happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hippodrome[COLOR_REVERT], the Byzantine replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatre[COLOR_REVERT], increases happiness and culture output, increases the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT] and doubles the happiness output from using the culture slider.
Royal Mounted Police

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT] increase your cities' defense against pre-gunpowder units, generate a small amount of culture and also grant experience to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Units[COLOR_REVERT].
Taixue

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taixue[COLOR_REVERT], the Chinese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], provides extra culture and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coal Plants[COLOR_REVERT] provide power and unhealthiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coal[COLOR_REVERT].
Hacienda

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hacienda[COLOR_REVERT], the Colombian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Estate[COLOR_REVERT], increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bananas[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT].
Amphitheatre
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amphitheatres[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's happiness and its happiness output from using the culture slider.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouses[COLOR_REVERT] lower city maintenance costs, provide you with a bonus to espionage.
Customs House
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Customs Houses[COLOR_REVERT] increase the commerce generated by a city's Foreign Trade Routes.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Drydocks[COLOR_REVERT] build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Water Units[COLOR_REVERT] much faster and grant [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Naval Units[COLOR_REVERT] experience points, but also add unhealthiness to the city.
Obelisk

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Obelisk[COLOR_REVERT], the Egyptian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT], provides a major bonus to Culture output in your city and allows you to hire a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dun[COLOR_REVERT], the Celtic replacement for [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT], gives all eligible units built in this city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guerrilla I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
Royal Exchange
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Royal Exchange[COLOR_REVERT], the English replacement for a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bank[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's production of wealth more.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stele[COLOR_REVERT], the Ethiopian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], allows you to hire two [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialists.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's production at the cost of adding significant unhealthiness. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factories[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Industrial Parks[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coal Plants[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hydro Plants[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Solar Plants[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nuclear Plants[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Industrial Parks[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's production output and unhealthiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Aluminium[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Oil[COLOR_REVERT]. They also allow you to hire two [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialists.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Intelligence Agencies[COLOR_REVERT] increase the espionage points created by the city and grant experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Espionage Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in their city.
Caravanserai

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Caravanserai[COLOR_REVERT], the Iranian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], provides an extra trade route, increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] increase production, increases the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gems[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Gold[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silver[COLOR_REVERT], but also adds unhealthiness. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forges[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Eiffel Tower[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Statue of Liberty[COLOR_REVERT] world wonders, and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ironworks[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Salon[COLOR_REVERT], the French replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coffee House[COLOR_REVERT], provides a cultural bonus, increases the birthrate of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great People[COLOR_REVERT] and allows you to hire a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Assembly Plant[COLOR_REVERT], the German replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factory[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's unit production, increases a city's military unit production, gives one free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and is produced 50% faster with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coal[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Granaries[COLOR_REVERT] store food to help increase a city's growth rate.
Ger

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ger[COLOR_REVERT], the Mongol replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stable[COLOR_REVERT], grant even more experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in its city. It also increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cows[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Odeon[COLOR_REVERT], the Greek replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatre[COLOR_REVERT], increase a city's happiness and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocers[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's wealth. It also increases the city's health with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bananas[COLOR_REVERT]. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grocers[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarkets[COLOR_REVERT].
Reservoir

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Reservoir[COLOR_REVERT], the Harappan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bath[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Masonry[COLOR_REVERT] technology instead of the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Medicine[COLOR_REVERT] technology.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbors[COLOR_REVERT] improve the food output of water plots. A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbor[COLOR_REVERT] is required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Customs Houses[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharfs[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]San Marco Basilica[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Rathaus[COLOR_REVERT], the German replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Civic Square[COLOR_REVERT], lowers city maintenance, increases a city's cultural output and increases a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hospitals[COLOR_REVERT] help units heal damage more quickly and adds health to a city. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hospitals[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Red Cross Society[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
Tambo

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Tambo[COLOR_REVERT], the Incan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Post Office[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Engineering[COLOR_REVERT] technology instead of the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Paper[COLOR_REVERT] technology, is cheaper and increases trade route yield.
Edict
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Edict[COLOR_REVERT], the Indian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT], lowers city maintenance costs.
Mausoleum

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mausoleum[COLOR_REVERT], the Mughal replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Estate[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Heritage[COLOR_REVERT] technology instead of the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Horticulture[COLOR_REVERT] technology and provides a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT]
Stepwell
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stepwell[COLOR_REVERT], the Indian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT], doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mathematics[COLOR_REVERT] technology.
Candi
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Candi[COLOR_REVERT], the Indonesian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT], provides one production.
Art Studio

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Art Studio[COLOR_REVERT], the Italian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forge[COLOR_REVERT], provides a big culture boost and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jails[COLOR_REVERT] lower city maintenance costs and increase espionage. They are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Constabularies[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hydro Plants[COLOR_REVERT] provide pollution-free power.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Nuclear Plants[COLOR_REVERT] provide pollution-free power with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Uranium[COLOR_REVERT], allows you to hire a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and allows the city to build [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ICBM[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Observatories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's scientific research. They are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratories[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zaibatsu[COLOR_REVERT], the Japanese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Factory[COLOR_REVERT], is cheaper, gives one free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and improves the commerce output of water plots.
Zaibatsu
Mbwadi

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mbwadi[COLOR_REVERT], the Congolese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Weaver[COLOR_REVERT], increases the city's wealth output and allows you to hire a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Baray[COLOR_REVERT], the Khmer replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT], provides two extra food.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Markets[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's wealth. They also increase the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fur[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whales[COLOR_REVERT].
Mint
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mint[COLOR_REVERT], the Mandinka replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forge[COLOR_REVERT], provides a small increase in wealth.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Levees[COLOR_REVERT] provide a production bonus from all river tiles worked by the city.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lighthouses[COLOR_REVERT] provide an extra trade route.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Seowon[COLOR_REVERT], the Korean replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Paper[COLOR_REVERT] technology and instead of the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Academia[COLOR_REVERT] technology.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universities[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's research and provide culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universities[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National College[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trading Post[COLOR_REVERT], the Viking replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lighthouse[COLOR_REVERT], gives all ships built in this city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Navigation I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libraries[COLOR_REVERT] boost your city's research and provide culture. They are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Universities[COLOR_REVERT].

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratories[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's scientific research increase with access to power and its spaceship production. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratories[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]CERN Research Complex[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder.
Ball Court

French.Text: Terrain de jeu de balle:Terrains de jeu de balle

Spanish.Text: Campo del juego de pelota:Campos del juego de pelota

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ball Court[COLOR_REVERT], the Mayan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amphitheatre[COLOR_REVERT], provides one extra happiness and grants experience points to melee and archery units built in its city.
Charreada Arena

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Charreada Arena[COLOR_REVERT], the Mexican replacement for a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Amphitheatre[COLOR_REVERT], grants experience points to mounted units built in its city and increases happiness from access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT].
Noria
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Noria[COLOR_REVERT], the Moorish replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Aqueduct[COLOR_REVERT], provides a production bonus and is cheaper.
Dike
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dike[COLOR_REVERT], the Dutch replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Levee[COLOR_REVERT], provides a production bonus from all water tiles worked by a city.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's defenses against pre-gunpowder units. They are required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castles[COLOR_REVERT].
Pagan Temple

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Apothecary[COLOR_REVERT], the Persian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's health and increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Silk[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT].
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temples[COLOR_REVERT] provide a small amount of culture.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hammam[COLOR_REVERT], the Turkish replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bath[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's happiness and increases the city's culture output.
Glassmaker
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Glassmaker[COLOR_REVERT], the Phoenician replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's trade route yield.
Plague
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Feitoria[COLOR_REVERT], the Portuguese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Customs House[COLOR_REVERT], improves the commerce output of water plots.
Feitoria
Sejmik
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sejmik[COLOR_REVERT], the Polish replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Courthouse[COLOR_REVERT], provides a small cash and happiness bonus.
Mala'e

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mala'e[COLOR_REVERT], the Polynesian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT], provides additional culture and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Recycling Centres[COLOR_REVERT] remove all negative health from buildings.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Public Transportation[COLOR_REVERT] increases health for [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Villages[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Towns[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Research Institute[COLOR_REVERT], the Russian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Laboratory[COLOR_REVERT], provides a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and allows you to hire one extra [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
Security Bureau
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stables[COLOR_REVERT] grant experience points to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in their cities.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Security Bureaus[COLOR_REVERT] increase the cost of enemy espionage missions in their city, grant [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Informant I[COLOR_REVERT] to [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Espionage Units[COLOR_REVERT] built in its city and are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Lubyanka[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonder.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Citadel[COLOR_REVERT], the Spanish replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Castle[COLOR_REVERT], is half the production cost and lowers city maintenance.
Smokehouse

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Smokehouses[COLOR_REVERT] increase the city's health with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cows[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pigs[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Forum[COLOR_REVERT], the Roman replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], increases a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate and allows you to hire two [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialists.
Ziggurat

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ziggurat[COLOR_REVERT], the Babylonian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pagan Temple[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Polytheism[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mysticism[COLOR_REVERT] technology, provides extra culture and gives a small science and culture boost.
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Supermarkets[COLOR_REVERT] increase food output in cities with access to power.
Sangam

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sangam[COLOR_REVERT], the Tamil replacement the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], provides an extra cultural boost and allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ikhanda[COLOR_REVERT], the Zulu replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Barracks[COLOR_REVERT], are more expensive and lower city maintenance costs.
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pavillion[COLOR_REVERT], the Chinese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatre[COLOR_REVERT], provides an extra cultural boost
Ho Trai
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ho Trai[COLOR_REVERT], the Thai replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], increases happiness and is cheaper.

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatres[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Theatres[COLOR_REVERT] also provide culture and is required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
Gompa

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gompa[COLOR_REVERT], the Tibetan replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]University[COLOR_REVERT], provides less research, increases a city's defenses against pre-gunpowder units, allows you to hire one [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist, provides a free [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Priest[COLOR_REVERT] specialist, doesn't require a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Library[COLOR_REVERT], and requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Paper[COLOR_REVERT] technology instead of the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Academia[COLOR_REVERT] technology.
Jewish Synagogue

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Synagogues[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Synagogues[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Sanhedrin[COLOR_REVERT] building.
Jewish Yeshiva

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Yeshivas[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Jewish Rabbis[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
Jewish Sanhedrin

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sanhedrin[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Solomon[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jewish Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Salomons Tempel[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Jüdischer Schrein[COLOR_REVERT]) produziert in allen Städten, die das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judentum[COLOR_REVERT] praktizieren, 1 Gold/Runde bis zu einem Maximum von 20 Gold. Außerdem verbreitet er das [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judentum[COLOR_REVERT] in aller Welt und erhöht die Chancen einer Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Propheten[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.

TEXT.English: Orthodox Church

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Churches[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Churches[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] building.
Orthodox Monastery

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Orthodox Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
Orthodox Cathedral

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
Church of the Anastasis

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Church of the Anastasis[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Orthodox Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
Catholic Church

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Churches[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Churches[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] building.
Catholic Monastery

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catholic Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
Catholic Cathedral

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
Saint Peter's Basilica

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Saint Peter's Basilica[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Catholic Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT]. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
Protestant Church

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Churches[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Churches[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] building.
Protestant Seminary

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Seminaries[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Protestant Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
Protestant Cathedral

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
All Saints' Church

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]All Saints' Church[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Protestant Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
Islamic Mosque

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mosques[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Islamic Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mosques[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Islamic Grand Mosque[COLOR_REVERT] building.
Islamic Madrassa

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Madrasahs[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Islamic Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Islamic Imams[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
Islamic Grand Mosque

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grand Mosque[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Islamic Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Masjid al-Haram[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Islamic Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
Hindu Mandir

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mandirs[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. The first player to build a [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mandir[COLOR_REVERT] founds Buddhism. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mandirs[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Kshetra[COLOR_REVERT] building.
Hindu Ashram

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ashrams[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hindu Gurus[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
Hindu Kshetra

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kshetra[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
Vishwanath

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Vishwanath[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Vishwanath[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hindu-Schrein[COLOR_REVERT]) produziert in allen Städten, die den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduismus[COLOR_REVERT] praktizieren, 1 Gold/Runde bis zu einem Maximum von 20 Gold. Außerdem verbreitet er den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduismus[COLOR_REVERT] in aller Welt und erhöht die Chancen einer Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Propheten[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.

TEXT.English: Buddhist Stupa

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stupas[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stupas[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Chaitya[COLOR_REVERT] building.
Buddhist Sangha

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sanghas[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Buddhist Bhikkus[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
Buddhist Chaitya

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Chaitya[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mahabodhi[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Buddhist Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT] throughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
Confucian Miao

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Miaos[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Miaos[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Xue Gong[COLOR_REVERT] building.
Confucian Academy

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academies[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Confucian Scholars[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
Confucian Guozijian

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Guozijian[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
San Kong

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]San Kong[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Confucian Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]San Kong[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Konfuzianischer Schrein[COLOR_REVERT]) produziert in allen Städten, die den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Konfuzianismus[COLOR_REVERT] praktizieren, 1 Gold/Runde bis zu einem Maximum von 20 Gold. Außerdem verbreitet er den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Konfuzianismus[COLOR_REVERT] in aller Welt und erhöht die Chancen einer Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Propheten[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.

TEXT.English: Taoist Guan

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Guans[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Guans[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Gong[COLOR_REVERT] building.
Taoist Dongtian

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dongtianas[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taoist Daoshis[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
Taoist Gong

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Gong[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
The Temple of Heaven

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Temple of Heaven[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoist Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT] thoughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Der [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Himmelstempel[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Taoistischer Schrein[COLOR_REVERT]) produziert in allen Städten, die den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoismus[COLOR_REVERT] praktizieren, 1 Gold/Runde bis zu einem Maximum von 20 Gold. Außerdem verbreitet er den [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoismus[COLOR_REVERT] in aller Welt und erhöht die Chancen einer Stadt, einen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Großen Propheten[COLOR_REVERT] hervorzubringen.

TEXT.English: Zoroastrian Fire Temple

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fire Temples[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Temples[COLOR_REVERT]) increase a city's happiness and culture. [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Fire Temples[COLOR_REVERT] are required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Royal Fire[COLOR_REVERT] building.
Zoroastrian Pir

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pirs[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Monasteries[COLOR_REVERT]) allow you to create [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Zoroastrian Magu[COLOR_REVERT], who can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] in other cities. They also provide culture and a slight boost to research.
Zoroastrian Royal Fire

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Royal Fire[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Cathedral[COLOR_REVERT]) greatly increases a city's cultural output. It increases the city's happiness if [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] is your state religion, or if you have access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Incense[COLOR_REVERT].
Adur Farnbag

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Adur Farnbag[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Zoroastrian Shrine[COLOR_REVERT]) produces one gold each turn for every city in the world that practises [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT], with a limit of 20 gold. It also spreads [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] throughout the world and increases its city's chances of generating a [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT].
Weaver

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Weavers[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sheep[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cotton[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Dye[COLOR_REVERT].
Bath
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Baths[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output and add health to a city.
Constabulary
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Constabularies[COLOR_REVERT] lower a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]War Weariness[COLOR_REVERT] and increase espionage significantly.
Coffee House

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Coffee Houses[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase the city's happiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coffee[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tea[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tabacco[COLOR_REVERT].
Post Office
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Post Offices[COLOR_REVERT] provide an extra trade route and increase espionage.
Wharf

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharfs[COLOR_REVERT] increase that city's income from trade routes and increase that city's health from access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Clam[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Crab[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fish[COLOR_REVERT] resources. A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Wharf[COLOR_REVERT] is required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Trafalgar Square[COLOR_REVERT] world wonder.
Civic Square
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Civic Squares[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate.
Sewer
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Sewers[COLOR_REVERT] improve a city's health.
Distillery

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Distilleries[COLOR_REVERT] increase the city's wealth and unhealthiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Banana[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sugar[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT].
News Press
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]News Presses[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate.
Cinema
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Cinemas[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase the happiness output.
Hotel
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hotels[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They also increase trade route yield and increase trade route yield even more for each level of culture.
Park
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Parks[COLOR_REVERT] increase health for [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Villages[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Towns[COLOR_REVERT].
Solar Plant
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Solar Plants[COLOR_REVERT] provide pollution-free power.
Estate

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Estates[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increase a city's cultural output and allows you to hire a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Artist[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
Pharmacy

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Pharmacies[COLOR_REVERT] increase the city's healthiness with access to [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Banana[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wine[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Spices[COLOR_REVERT] and allow you to hire a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
Railway Station
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Railway Stations[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's wealth at the cost of adding significant unhealthiness.
Department Store
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Department Stores[COLOR_REVERT] increase wealth in cities with access to power.
Star Fort
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Star Forts[COLOR_REVERT] reduces damage from bombards from all units.
Electrical Grid
[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Electrical Grids[COLOR_REVERT] increase commerce output in cities with access to power.
Edubba
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Edubba[COLOR_REVERT], the Babylonian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Libary[COLOR_REVERT], is half the production cost and increases science output.
Pesedjet Temple
Ancestor Shrine
Vedic Temple
Olympian Temple
Baalist Temple
Atua Shrine
Mazdaist Temple
Teotl Step Pyramid
Shinto Shrine
Asatru Hof
Druidic Nemeton
Shrine of Perun
Yoruba Temple
Inti Temple
Tengri Obo
Hubal Temple
Astar Temple

[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monuments[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's cultural output. They are also required to build [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Civic Squares[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]National Monument[COLOR_REVERT].
Immigration Office
[ICON_BULLET]Increases the chance of attracting immigrants

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Immigration Office[COLOR_REVERT], the Australian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Customs House[COLOR_REVERT], can be build in every city and provides an extra trade route.
Souq
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Souq[COLOR_REVERT], the Mamluk replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Market[COLOR_REVERT], increases the culture output of the city.
Piaohao
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Piaohao[COLOR_REVERT], the Manchurian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bank[COLOR_REVERT], stores food.
Iya
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Iya[COLOR_REVERT], the Nigerian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT], lowers city maintenance.
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Iya[COLOR_REVERT], the Nigerian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT], lowers city maintenance.
TEXT.German: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Iya[COLOR_REVERT], the Nigerian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT], lowers city maintenance.
TEXT.Italian: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Iya[COLOR_REVERT], the Nigerian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT], lowers city maintenance.
TEXT.Spanish: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Iya[COLOR_REVERT], the Nigerian replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Walls[COLOR_REVERT], lowers city maintenance.

TEXT.English: Port
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Port[COLOR_REVERT], the Philipine replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Harbor[COLOR_REVERT], increases the city's wealth output.
Plaas
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Plaas[COLOR_REVERT], the Boer replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Star Fort[COLOR_REVERT], provides two extra food.
Ziara
The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ziara[COLOR_REVERT], the Swahili replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Monument[COLOR_REVERT], grants one free trade route.
Riksbank
The Swedish [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Riksbank[COLOR_REVERT] greatly increases a city's production of wealth and increases a city's [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT] birth rate.
Dinh

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dinh[COLOR_REVERT], the Vietnamese replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Civic Square[COLOR_REVERT], gives all eligible units built in this city the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]City Garrison I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
Kraal

The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kraal[COLOR_REVERT], the Zimbabwean replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Smokehouse[COLOR_REVERT], increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cows[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pigs[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kraal[COLOR_REVERT], the Zimbabwean replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Smokehouse[COLOR_REVERT], increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cows[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pigs[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kraal[COLOR_REVERT], the Zimbabwean replacement for the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Smokehouse[COLOR_REVERT], increases the improved tile yield of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cows[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Deer[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pigs[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT].
